content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'bankmarketing' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.bankmarketing
	(
	 [age] bigint,
	 [job] nvarchar(4000),
	 [marital] nvarchar(4000),
	 [education] nvarchar(4000),
	 [defaulted] nvarchar(4000),
	 [housing] nvarchar(4000),
	 [loan] nvarchar(4000),
	 [contact] nvarchar(4000),
	 [month] nvarchar(4000),
	 [day_of_week] nvarchar(4000),
	 [duration] bigint,
	 [campaign] bigint,
	 [pdays] bigint,
	 [previous] bigint,
	 [poutcome] nvarchar(4000),
	 [empvarrate] float,
	 [conspriceidx] float,
	 [consconfidx] float,
	 [euribor3m] float,
	 [nremployed] float,
	 [y] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_bankmarketing
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.bankmarketing
(age 1, job 2, marital 3, education 4, defaulted 5, housing 6, loan 7, contact 8, month 9, day_of_week 10, duration 11, campaign 12, pdays 13, previous 14, poutcome 15, empvarrate 16, conspriceidx 17, consconfidx 18, euribor3m 19, nremployed 20, y 21)
FROM 'https://synapseadlsfraud.dfs.core.windows.net/testapache/testData/bankmarketing_test.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapseadlsfraud.dfs.core.windows.net/testapache/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.bankmarketing
GO
